text: I'm working on a diagram that explains some of the connections related to HubSpot for a web project. At the moment, the HubSpot portion looks like this:
Any other HubSpot responsibilities worth mentioning?
Should I include CDN? (not everything goes through a CDN though right or is that obvious?)
I know there's some kind of monitoring and alert stuff that seems relevant but I can't find it

Reminder: INBOUND 2021 starts tomorrow, Starter Passes are free. <https://www.inbound.com/|Register today> so you can hop into sessions tomorrow quickly and easily. If you’d like to socialize with other developers attending INBOUND, we’ll be hanging out in <#C01BBPNJ25A|inbound-conference>.

Could you kinda explain what exactly you’re trying to convey in the diagram.

Some things that may be relevant, but I’m not sure I’m on the same page as you:
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/speed#what-does-HubSpot-handle-for-you->
• <https://legal.HubSpot.com/security>

<@U7SL518D6> Can I send you the entire diagram in a DM? I'd rather not share publicly at the moment.
Sure, main thing I’m wondering is what the purpose and meaning of the box for HubSpot is and what types of things you’re actually wanting to include.
